alignment_workflow.yaml.description: A description of the specific bioinformatics workflow or pipeline used for sequence alignment.
alignment_workflow.yaml.title: Alignment Workflow

expcity.description: The city of exposure. From RERF 'dose_masterlist' table.

submitter_id.description: A project-specific identifier for a node. This property is the calling card/nickname/alias for a unit of submission. It can be used in place of the UUID for identifying or recalling a node.

sysid.description: A unique identifier for an individual person within a project. The 'sysid' key in RERF tables.

workflow_link.description: Link to Github hash for the CWL workflow used.

workflow_name.description: The name of an encapsulated bioinformatics workflow or pipeline.

workflow_description.description: A brief description of the workflow or pipeline used to generate the data.

workflow_version.description: Major version for a GDC workflow.

object_id.description: The GUID of the object in the index service.

reflux_treatment_type.description: Text term used to describe the types of treatment used to manage gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD).

weeks_gestation_at_birth.description: Numeric value used to describe the number of weeks starting  from the approximate date of the biological mother's last menstrual period and ending with the birth of the patient.

laterality.description: For tumors in paired organs, designates the side on which the cancer originates.

analyte_type.description: Text term that represents the kind of molecular specimen analyte.

datetime.description: A combination of date and time of day in the form [-]CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss[Z|(+|-)hh:mm]

icd10_code.description: The high-level icd10 classification of disease.

days_to_diagnosis.description: Number of days between the date used for index and the date of diagnosis.

termDef.term: Performance Status Assessment Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Scale

ecog_performance_status.description: The ECOG functional performance status of the patient/participant.

vital_status.description: The survival state of the person registered on the protocol.

termDef.term: International Classification of Diseases for Oncology, Third Edition ICD-O-3 Histology Code

morphology.description: The third edition of the International Classification of Diseases for Oncology, published in 2000 used principally in tumor and cancer registries for coding the site (topography) and the histology (morphology) of neoplasms. The study of the structure of the cells and their arrangement to constitute tissues and, finally, the association among these to form organs. In pathology, the microscopic process of identifying normal and abnormal morphologic characteristics in tissues, by employing various cytochemical and immunocytochemical stains. A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

tobacco_smoking_status.description: Category describing current smoking status and smoking history as self-reported by a patient.

percent_inflam_infiltration.description: Numeric value to represent local response to cellular injury, marked by capillary dilatation, edema and leukocyte infiltration; clinically, inflammation is manifest by reddness, heat, pain, swelling and loss of function, with the need to heal damaged tissue.

termDef.term: Molecular Laboratory Procedure Ploidy Result Type

ploidy.description: Text term used to describe the number of sets of homologous chromosomes.

termDef.term: Rhabdomyosarcoma Children's Oncology Group Risk Assessment Category

cog_rhabdomyosarcoma_risk_group.description: Text term used to describe the classification of rhabdomyosarcoma, as defined by the Children's Oncology Group (COG).

termDef.term: Human Immunodeficiency Virus Diagnosis Subtract Initial Pathologic Diagnosis Time Duration Day Calculation Value

days_to_hiv_diagnosis.description: Time interval from the date of the initial pathologic diagnosis to the date of human immunodeficiency diagnosis, represented as a calculated number of days.

termDef.term: Therapeutic Procedure Prior Specimen Collection Administered Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator

prior_treatment.description: A yes/no/unknown/not applicable indicator related to the administration of therapeutic agents received before the body specimen was collected.

irs_group.description: Text term used to describe the classification of rhabdomyosarcoma tumors, as defined by the Intergroup Rhabdomyosarcoma Study (IRS).

RIN.description: A numerical assessment of the integrity of RNA based on the entire electrophoretic trace of the RNA sample including the presence or absence of degradation products.

method_of_diagnosis.description: The method used to initially the patient's diagnosis.

fragment_minimum_length.description: Minimum length of the sequenced fragments (e.g., as predicted by Agilent Bioanalyzer).

lane_number.description: The basic machine unit for sequencing. For Illumina machines, this reflects the physical lane number. Wrong or missing information may affect analysis results.

termDef.term: Pathology Review Slide Proliferating Cell Count

number_proliferating_cells.description: Numeric value that represents the count of proliferating cells determined during pathologic review of the sample slide(s).

project_id.description: Unique ID for any specific defined piece of work that is undertaken or attempted to meet a single requirement.

file_state.description: The current state of the data file object.

termDef.term: Molecular Laboratory Procedure Histone Family Category

histone_family.description: The text term used to describe the family, or classification of a group of basic proteins found in chromatin, called histones.

termDef.term: Tissue Sample Clamping and Freezing Elapsed Minute Time

time_between_clamping_and_freezing.description: Numeric representation of the elapsed time between the surgical clamping of blood supply and freezing of the sample, measured in minutes.

termDef.term: Molecular Laboratory Procedure Outcome Unit of Measure

test_units.description: The text term used to describe the units of the test value for a molecular test. This property is used in conjunction with test_value.

termDef.term: Patient International Neuroblastoma Risk Group Classification System Stage

inrg_stage.description: The text term used to describe the staging classification of neuroblastic tumors, as defined by the International Neuroblastoma Risk Group (INRG).

selected_normal_wgs.description: Denotes which WGS normal aliquot to submitter prefers to use for variant calling. Only one normal per experimental strategy per case can be selected.

termDef.term: Tumor Location Central Nervous System Tissue Type

supratentorial_localization.description: Text term to specify the location of the supratentorial tumor.

smoking_history.description: Category describing current smoking status and smoking history as self-reported by a patient.

termDef.term: Specimen Processing Formalin Fixed Paraffin Embedded Tissue Indicator

is_ffpe.description: Indicator to signify whether or not the tissue sample was fixed in formalin and embedded in paraffin (FFPE).

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure Genetic Abnormality Test Result Type

biomarker_result.description: Text term to define the results of genetic testing.

days_to_sample_procurement.description: The number of days from the date the patient was diagnosed to the date of the procedure that produced the sample.

freezing_method.description: Text term that represents the method used for freezing the sample.

termDef.term: Esophageal Columnar Mucosa Goblet Cell Present Indicator

goblet_cells_columnar_mucosa_present.description: The yes/no/unknown indicator used to describe whether goblet cells were determined to be present in the esophageal columnar mucosa.

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure C-Reactive Protein Result Specified Value

crp.description: The value the result of the medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood for C-reactive protein, encoded by the CRP gene this protein is cleaved during biological activation and is associated with host defense mechanisms and inflammatory responses.

disease_type.description: The text term used to describe the type of malignant disease, as categorized by the World Health Organization's (WHO) International Classification of Diseases for Oncology (ICD-O).

gender.description: Text designations that identify gender. Gender is described as the assemblage of properties that distinguish people on the basis of their societal roles. [Explanatory Comment 1: Identification of gender is based upon self-report and may come from a form, questionnaire, interview, etc.]

preservation_method.description: Text term that represents the method used to preserve the sample.

gross_tumor_weight.description: Numeric value used to describe the gross pathologic tumor weight, measured in grams.

race.description: An arbitrary classification of a taxonomic group that is a division of a species. It usually arises as a consequence of geographical isolation within a species and is characterized by shared heredity, physical attributes and behavior, and in the case of humans, by common history, nationality, or geographic distribution. The provided values are based on the categories defined by the U.S. Office of Management and Business and used by the U.S. Census Bureau.

ann_arbor_extranodal_involvement.description: Indicator that identifies whether a patient with malignant lymphoma has lymphomatous involvement of an extranodal site.

tobacco_smoking_quit_year.description: The year in which the participant quit smoking.

termDef.term: Molecular Analysis Secondary Gene Symbol Code

second_gene_symbol.description: The text term used to describe a secondary gene targeted or included in molecular analysis. For rearrangements, this is should represent the location of the variant.

termDef.term: Molecular Laboratory Procedure Locus Location Text

locus.description: Alphanumeric value used to describe the locus of a specific genetic variant. Example: NM_001126114.

termDef.term: Children's Oncology Group Neuroblastoma Risk Group Assignment Category

cog_neuroblastoma_risk_group.description: Text term that represents the categorization of patients on the basis of prognostic factors per a system developed by Children's Oncology Group (COG). Risk level is used to assign treatment intensity.

target_capture_kit.description: Description that can uniquely identify a target capture kit. Suggested value is a combination of vendor, kit name, and kit version.

antigen.description: The text term used to describe an antigen included in molecular testing.

termDef.term: Tissue Sample Optimal Cutting Temperature Compound Embedding Indicator

oct_embedded.description: Indicator of whether or not the sample was embedded in Optimal Cutting Temperature (OCT) compound.

tumor_code.description: Diagnostic tumor code of the tissue sample source.

relationship_type.description: The subgroup that describes the state of connectedness between members of the unit of society organized around kinship ties.

days_to_treatment.description: Number of days from date of initial pathologic diagnosis that treatment began.

fev1_fvc_pre_bronch_percent.description: Percentage value to represent result of Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second (FEV1) divided by the Forced Vital Capacity (FVC) pre-bronchodilator.

hpv_positive_type.description: Text classification to represent the strain or type of human papillomavirus identified in an individual.

percent_granulocyte_infiltration.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of infiltration by granulocytes in a tumor sample or specimen.

fragment_mean_length.description: Mean length of the sequenced fragments (e.g., as predicted by Agilent Bioanalyzer).

analyte_type_id.description: A single letter code used to identify a type of molecular analyte.

termDef.term: Person Cigarette Smoking History Pack Year Value

pack_years_smoked.description: Numeric computed value to represent lifetime tobacco exposure defined as number of cigarettes smoked per day x number of years smoked divided by 20.

molecular_analysis_method.description: The text term used to describe the method used for molecular analysis.

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure Absolute Neutrophil Count Result Unspecified Value

absolute_neutrophil.description: The value, in 1000/uL, for the medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood for the absolute neutrophil count, the real number of white blood cells (WBCs) that are neutrophils and is derived by multiplying the WBC count times the percent of neutrophils in the differential WBC count; the percent of neutrophils consists of the segmented (fully mature neutrophils) + the bands (almost mature neutrophils).

comorbidity.description: The text term used ot describe the method used to diagnose the patient's comorbidity disease.

termDef.term: Patient Diagnosis Age Day Value Greater than 89

age_at_diagnosis_gt89.description: Indicate whether the 'Age at the time of diagnosis expressed in number of days since birth' is greater than 32,872 days (89 years).

to_trim_adapter_sequence.description: Does the user suggest adapter trimming?

gene_symbol.description: The text term used to describe a gene targeted or included in molecular analysis. For rearrangements, this is shold be used to represent the reference gene.

state.description: The current state of the object.

fev1_fvc_post_bronch_percent.description: Percentage value to represent result of Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second (FEV1) divided by the Forced Vital Capacity (FVC) post-bronchodilator.

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure Lactate Dehydrogenase Result  Integer::2 Decimal Place Value

ldh_level.description: The 2 decimal place numeric laboratory value measured, assigned or computed related to the assessment of lactate dehydrogenase in a specimen. Measured in U/L.

days_to_recurrence.description: Number of days between the date used for index and the date the patient was diagnosed with a recurrent malignancy.

no_matched_normal_targeted_sequencing.description: There will be no matched normal Targeted Sequencing aliquots for this case that can be used for variant calling purposes. The GDC may elect to use a single tumor calling pipeline to process this data.

igl_lambda.description: The patient's serum immunoglobulin light chain lambda value at a certain point in time.

termDef.term: Gynecologic Tumor Grouping Cervical Endometrial FIGO 2009 Stage

figo_stage.description: The extent of a cervical or endometrial cancer within the body, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body, as described by the International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics (FIGO) stages.

child_pugh_classification.description: The text term used to describe the classification used in the prognosis of chronic liver disease, mainly cirrhosis.

percent_lymphocyte_infiltration.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of infiltration by lymphocytes in a solid tissue normal sample or specimen.

termDef.term: Peripancreatic Lymph Node Positive Finding Range

peripancreatic_lymph_nodes_positive.description: Enumerated numeric value or range of values used to describe the number of peripancreatic lymph nodes determined to be positive.

alcohol_drinks_per_day.description: Numeric value used to describe the average number of alcoholic beverages  a person consumes per day.

progression_or_recurrence_anatomic_site.description: Text term that describes the anatomic site of the progression or recurrent tumor or relapsed disease.

estrogen_receptor_percent_positive_ihc.description: Classification to represent ER Positive results expressed as a percentage value.

diagnosis_pathologically_confirmed.description: The histologic description of tissue or cells confirmed by a pathology review of frozen or formalin fixed slide(s) completed after the diagnostic pathology review of the tumor sample used to extract analyte(s).

28s_16s_ribosomal_rna_ratio.description: The 28S/18S ribosomal RNA band ratio used to assess the quality of total RNA.

fragment_standard_deviation_length.description: Standard deviation of the sequenced fragments length (e.g., as predicted by Agilent Bioanalyzer).

estrogen_receptor_result_ihc.description: Text term to represent the overall result of Estrogen Receptor (ER) testing.

ann_arbor_tumor_stage.description: The classification of the anatomic disease extent of lymphoma (Hodgkin's and Non-Hodgkins) based on the Ann Arbor Staging System.

amount.description: Weight in grams or volume in mL.

termDef.term: International Neuroblastoma Pathology Classification Histology Score Category

inpc_histologic_group.description: The text term used to describe the classification of neuroblastomas distinguishing between favorable and unfavorable histologic groups. The histologic score, defined by the International Neuroblastoma Pathology Classification (INPC), is based on age, mitosis-karyorrhexis index (MKI), stromal content and degree of tumor cell differentiation.

lymph_nodes_positive.description: The number of lymph nodes involved with disease as determined by pathologic examination.

progression_free_survival.description: Number of days between the date used for index and the first date the patient is known to be free of disease progression.

residual_disease.description: Text terms to describe the status of a tissue margin following surgical resection.

height.description: The height of the patient in centimeters.

percent_necrosis.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of cell death in a malignant tumor sample or specimen.

treatment_outcome.description: Text term that describes the patient's final outcome after the treatment was administered.

termDef.term: Alcohol Consumption Weekly Days Usage Number

alcohol_days_per_week.description: Numeric value used to describe the average number of days each week that a person consumes an alcoholic beverage.

multiplex_barcode.description: The barcode/index sequence used. Wrong or missing information may affect analysis results.

wilms_tumor_histologic_subtype.description: The text term used to describe the classification of Wilms tumors distinguishing between favorable and unfavorable histologic groups.

termDef.term: American Joint Committee on Cancer Metastasis Stage Code

ajcc_pathologic_m.description: Code to represent the defined absence or presence of distant spread or metastases (M) to locations via vascular channels or lymphatics beyond the regional lymph nodes, using criteria established by the American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC).

termDef.term: Neoplasm American Joint Committee on Cancer Clinical Primary Tumor T Stage

ajcc_clinical_t.description: Extent of the primary cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined prior to treatment.

colon_polyps_history.description: Yes/No indicator to describe if the subject had a previous history of colon polyps as noted in the history/physical or previous endoscopic report (s).

risk_factor.description: The text term used to describe a risk factor the patient had at the time of or prior to their diagnosis.

termDef.term: Neoplasm American Joint Committee on Cancer Clinical Regional Lymph Node N Stage

ajcc_clinical_n.description: Extent of the regional lymph node involvement for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined prior to treatment.

termDef.term: Neoplasm American Joint Committee on Cancer Clinical Distant Metastasis M Stage

ajcc_clinical_m.description: Extent of the distant metastasis for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined prior to treatment.

irs_stage.description: The text term used to describe the classification of rhabdomyosarcoma tumors, as defined by the Intergroup Rhabdomyosarcoma Study (IRS).

first_symptom_prior_to_diagnosis.description: Text term used to describe the patient's first symptom experienced prior to diagnosis and thought to be related to the disease.

termDef.term: Nucleic Acid Absorbance at 260 And Absorbance at 280 DNA Purity Ratio Value

a260_a280_ratio.description: Numeric value that represents the sample ratio of nucleic acid absorbance at 260 nm and 280 nm, used to determine a measure of DNA purity.

progression_free_survival_event.description: The event used to define the patient's disease progression.

termDef.term: Barrett's Esophagus Diagnosis Goblet Cell Present Indicator

barretts_esophagus_goblet_cells_present.description: The yes/no/unknown indicator used to describe whether goblet cells were determined to be present in a patient diagnosed with Barrett's esophagus.

treatment_intent_type.description: Text term to identify the reason for the administration of a treatment regimen. [Manually-curated]

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure Lactate Dehydrogenase Result Integer::2 Decimal Place Value

ldh_level_at_diagnosis.description: The 2 decimal place numeric laboratory value measured, assigned or computed related to the assessment of lactate dehydrogenase in a specimen.

cea_level_preoperative.description: Numeric value of the Carcinoembryonic antigen or CEA at the time before surgery. [Manually- curated]

aliquot_volume.description: The volume in microliters (ml) of the aliquot(s) derived from the analyte(s) shipped for sequencing and characterization.

distributor_reference.description: Distributor reference number for cancer model.

index_date.description: The reference or anchor date used during date obfuscation, where a single date is obscurred by creating one or more date ranges in relation to this date.

bmi.description: A calculated numerical quantity that represents an individual's weight to height ratio.

termDef.term: Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease Therapeutic Procedure Performed Indicator

reflux_treatment.description: The yes/no/unknown indicator used to describe whether the patient received reflux treatment.

termDef.term: International Neuroblastoma Pathology Classification Grade Category

inpc_grade.description: Text term used to describe the classification of neuroblastic differentiation within neuroblastoma tumors, as defined by the International Neuroblastoma Pathology Classification (INPC).

termDef.term: New Neoplasm Event Post Initial Therapy Indicator

progression_or_recurrence.description: Yes/No/Unknown indicator to identify whether a patient has had a new tumor event after initial treatment.

termDef.term: Treatment Start Subtract First Pathologic Diagnosis Time Day Calculation Value

days_to_treatment_start.description: Time interval from the date of the initial pathologic diagnosis to the start of treatment, represented as a calculated number of days.

total_sequences.description: A count of the total number of sequences processed.

termDef.term: Treatment End Subtract First Pathologic Diagnosis Day Calculation Value

days_to_treatment_end.description: Time interval from the date of the initial pathologic diagnosis to the date of treatment end, represented as a calculated number of days.

data_file_error_type.description: Type of error for the data file object.

termDef.term: Neoplasm Disease Stage American Joint Committee on Cancer Code

ajcc_pathologic_stage.description: The extent of a cancer, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body based on AJCC staging criteria.

analyte_volume.description: The volume in microliters (ml) of the analyte(s) derived from the analyte(s) shipped for sequencing and characterization.

md5sum.description: The 128-bit hash value expressed as a 32 digit hexadecimal number (in lower case) used as a file's digital fingerprint.

termDef.term: Pre Bronchodilator Lung Forced Expiratory Volume 1 Test Lab Percentage Value

fev1_ref_pre_bronch_percent.description: The percentage comparison to a normal value reference range of the volume of air that a patient can forcibly exhale from the lungs in one second pre-bronchodilator.

termDef.term: Molecular Laboratory Procedure RNA Change Text

rna_change.description: Alphanumeric value used to describe the rna change for a specific genetic variant. Example: r.76a>c

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure Calcium Electrolytes Outcome Unspecified Value

calcium.description: The laboratory value related to the quantity of calcium present in peripheral blood serum measured by laboratory test.

primary_site.description: The text term used to describe the general location of the malignant disease, as categorized by the World Health Organization's (WHO) International Classification of Diseases for Oncology (ICD-O).

premature_at_birth.description: The yes/no/unknown indicator used to describe whether the patient was premature (less than 37 weeks gestation) at birth.

overall_survival.description: Number of days between the date used for index and the patient's date of death or the date the patient was last known to be alive.

termDef.term: International Neuroblastoma Pathology Classification Mitosis Karyorrhexis Index Category

mitosis_karyorrhexis_index.description: Text term that represents the component of the International Neuroblastoma Pathology Classification (INPC) for mitosis-karyorrhexis index (MKI).

karnofsky_performance_status.description: Text term used to describe the classification used of the functional capabilities of a person.

year_of_death.description: Numeric value to represent the year of the death of an individual.

classification_of_tumor.description: Text that describes the kind of disease present in the tumor specimen as related to a specific timepoint.

last_known_disease_status.description: Text term that describes the last known state or condition of an individual's neoplasm.

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure Hemoglobin Result Specified Value

hemoglobin.description: The value (g/dL) for a medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood for hemoglobin, red respiratory protein of erythrocytes, to help determine a diagnosis, plan treatment, check to see if treatment is working, or monitor the disease over time.

years_smoked.description: Numeric value (or unknown) to represent the number of years a person has been smoking.

primary_diagnosis.description: Text term for the structural pattern of cancer cells used to define a microscopic diagnosis.

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure Lower Limit of Normal Value

blood_test_normal_range_lower.description: Numeric value used to describe the lower limit of the normal range used to describe a healthy individual at the institution where the test was completed.

esophageal_columnar_metaplasia_present.description: The yes/no/unknown indicator used to describe whether esophageal columnar metaplasia was determined to be present.

microsatellite_instability_abnormal.description: The yes/no indicator to signify the status of a tumor for microsatellite instability.

ethnicity.description: An individual's self-described social and cultural grouping, specifically whether an individual describes themselves as Hispanic or Latino. The provided values are based on the categories defined by the U.S. Office of Management and Business and used by the U.S. Census Bureau.

best_overall_response.description: The best improvement achieved throughout the entire course of protocol treatment.

termDef.term: Lung Carbon Monoxide Diffusing Capability Test Assessment Predictive Value Percentage Value

dlco_ref_predictive_percent.description: The value, as a percentage of predicted lung volume, measuring the amount of carbon monoxide detected in a patient's lungs.

vascular_invasion_present.description: The yes/no indicator to ask if large vessel or venous invasion was detected by surgery or presence in a tumor specimen.

tumor_descriptor.description: Text that describes the kind of disease present in the tumor specimen as related to a specific timepoint.

inss_stage.description: Text term used to describe the staging classification of neuroblastic tumors, as defined by the International Neuroblastoma Staging System (INSS).

micropapillary_features.description: The yes/no/unknown indicator used to describe whether micropapillary features were determined to be present.

days_to_progression.description: Number of days between the date used for index and the date the patient was diagnosed with progression of disease.

selected_normal_low_pass_wgs.description: Denotes which low-pass WGS normal aliquot to submitter prefers to use for variant calling. Only one normal per experimental strategy per case can be selected.

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure M Protein Outcome Value

m_protein.description: The amount, in mg/dl, of monoclonal protein, a protein complex comprised of two heavy chains and two light chains, resulting from the medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood, urine, or other substance from the body.

composition.description: Text term that represents the cellular composition of the sample.

termDef.term: Therapeutic Procedure Prior Specimen Collection Administered Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator

treatment_or_therapy.description: A yes/no/unknown/not applicable indicator related to the administration of therapeutic agents received before the body specimen was collected.

termDef.term: Progesterone Receptor Level Cell Percentage Category

progesterone_receptor_percent_positive_i.description: Classification to represent Progesterone Receptor Positive results expressed as a percentage value.

creation_datetime.description: The datetime of portion creation encoded as seconds from epoch.

tumor_grade.description: Numeric value to express the degree of abnormality of cancer cells, a measure of differentiation and aggressiveness.

spike_ins_fasta.description: Name of the FASTA file that contains the spike-in sequences.

no_matched_normal_wxs.description: There will be no matched normal WXS aliquots for this case that can be used for variant calling purposes. The GDC may elect to use a single tumor calling pipeline to process this data.

normal_tumor_genotype_snp_match.description: Text term that represents whether or not the genotype of the normal tumor matches or if the data is not available.

year_of_birth.description: Numeric value to represent the calendar year in which an individual was born.

therapeutic_agents.description: Text identification of the individual agent(s) used as part of a prior treatment regimen.

termDef.term: Person Birth Date Less Initial Pathologic Diagnosis Date Calculated Day Value

days_to_birth.description: Time interval from a person's date of birth to the date of initial pathologic diagnosis, represented as a calculated negative number of days.

pancreatitis_onset_year.description: Numeric value to represent the year that the patient was diagnosed with clinical chronic pancreatitis.

treatment_type.description: Text term that describes the kind of treatment administered.

treatment_anatomic_site.description: The anatomic site or field targeted by a treatment regimen or single agent therapy.

lymphatic_invasion_present.description: A yes/no indicator to ask if small or thin-walled vessel invasion is present, indicating lymphatic involvement

read_group_name.description: The name of the read group.

termDef.term: Molecular Laboratory Procedure Genetic Zygosity Type

zygosity.description: The text term used to describe the zygosity of a specific genetic variant.

termDef.term: Biospecimen Analyte or Aliquot Plate Well Number

well_number.description: Numeric value that represents the the well location within a plate for the analyte or aliquot from the sample.

termDef.term: Tissue Sample Intermediate Dimension Millimeter Measurement

instrument_model.description: Numeric value that represents the sample dimension that is greater than the shortest dimension and less than the longest dimension, measured in millimeters.

metastasis_at_diagnosis_site.description: Text term to identify an anatomic site in which metastatic disease involvement is found.

termDef.term: Molecular Laboratory Procedure Amino Acid Change Text

aa_change.description: Alphanumeric value used to describe the amino acid change for a specific genetic variant. Example: R116Q.

age_at_index.description: The patient's age (in years) on the reference or anchor date date used during date obfuscation. If the age is greater than 89 years, see 'age_at_index_gt89'.

vascular_invasion_type.description: Text term that represents the type of vascular tumor invasion.

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure HER2/neu Immunohistochemistry Receptor Status

her2_erbb2_result_ihc.description: Text term to signify the result of the medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood or tissue for HER2 by histochemical localization of immunoreactive substances using labeled antibodies as reagents.

termDef.term: Tissue Sample Excision and Freezing Elapsed Minute Time

time_between_excision_and_freezing.description: Numeric representation of the elapsed time between the excision and freezing of the sample, measured in minutes.

ann_arbor_pathologic_stage.description: The text term used to describe the pathologic classification of lymphoma, as defined by the Ann Arbor Lymphoma Staging System.

no_matched_normal_low_pass_wgs.description: There will be no matched normal low pass WGS aliquots for this case that can be used for variant calling purposes. The GDC may elect to use a single tumor calling pipeline to process this data.

chromosome.description: The text term used to describe a chromosome targeted or included in molecular testing. If a specific genetic variant is being reported, this property can be used to capture the chromosome where that variant is located.

days_to_lost_to_followup.description: The number of days between the date used for index and to the date the patient was lost to follow-up.

cause_of_response.description: A specific regimen or line of therapy responsible for the patient's observed improvement achieved at a certain point in time during a patient's treatment protocol.

intermediate_dimension.description: Intermediate dimension of the sample, in millimeters.

analyte_quantity.description: The quantity in micrograms (ug) of the analyte(s) derived from the analyte(s) shipped for sequencing and characterization.

metastasis_at_diagnosis.description: The text term used to describe the extent of metastatic disease present at diagnosis.

termDef.term: Death Less Initial Pathologic Diagnosis Date Calculated Day Value

days_to_death.description: Time interval from a person's date of death to the date of initial pathologic diagnosis, represented as a calculated number of days.

termDef.term: Last Communication Contact Less Initial Pathologic Diagnosis Date Calculated Day Value

days_to_last_known_disease_status.description: Time interval from the date of last follow up to the date of initial pathologic diagnosis, represented as a calculated number of days.

comorbidity_method_of_diagnosis.description: The text term used to describe the method used to diagnose the patient's comorbidity disease.

termDef.term: American Joint Committee on Cancer Tumor Stage Code

ajcc_pathologic_t.description: Code of pathological T (primary tumor) to define the size or contiguous extension of the primary tumor (T), using staging criteria from the American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC).

platform.description: Name of the platform used to obtain data.

termDef.term: Neoplasm Disease Lymph Node Stage American Joint Committee on Cancer Code

ajcc_pathologic_n.description: The codes that represent the stage of cancer based on the nodes present (N stage) according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

termDef.term: Molecular Laboratory Procedure Histone Family Variant Type

histone_variant.description: The text term used to describe a specific histone variants, which are proteins that substitute for the core canonical histones.

termDef.term: Enneking Musculoskeletal Tumor Society Staging System Metastasis Stage

enneking_msts_metastasis.description: Text term and code that represents the metastatic stage of the musculoskeletal sarcoma, using the Enneking staging system approved by the Musculoskeletal Tumor Society (MSTS).

termDef.term: Purification Nucleic Acid Solution Concentration Determination Method Type

spectrophotometer_method.description: Name of the method used to determine the concentration of purified nucleic acid within a solution.

termDef.term: Patient Age at Index Greater than 89

age_at_index_gt89.description: Indicate whether 'The patient's age (in years) on the reference or anchor date date used during date obfuscation' is greater than 89 years.

termDef.term: Non-cancerous Esophageal Columnar Mucosa Dysplasia Grade Result

esophageal_columnar_dysplasia_degree.description: Text term to describe the amount of dysplasia found within the benign esophageal columnar mucosa.

alcohol_history.description: A response to a question that asks whether the participant has consumed at least 12 drinks of any kind of alcoholic beverage in their lifetime.

percent_monocyte_infiltration.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of monocyte infiltration in a sample or specimen.

fragment_maximum_length.description: Maximum length of the sequenced fragments (e.g., as predicted by Agilent Bioanalyzer).

cause_of_death.description: Text term to identify the cause of death for a patient.

portion_weight.description: Numeric value that represents the sample portion weight, measured in milligrams.

termDef.term: Malignant Neoplasm Neutrophil Infiltration Percentage Cell Value

percent_neutrophil_infiltration.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of infiltration by neutrophils in a tumor sample or specimen.

termDef.term: Molecular Laboratory Procedure Exon Identification Number

exon.description: Exon number targeted or included in a molecular analysis. If a specific genetic variant is being reported, this property can be used to capture the exon where that variant is located.

termDef.term: Esophageal Tumor Across Gastroesophageal Junction Indicator

gastric_esophageal_junction_involvement.description: The yes/no/unknown/not reported indicator used to describe whether the tumor is located across the gastroesophageal junction.

termDef.term: Enneking Musculoskeletal Tumor Society Staging System Tumor Stage

enneking_msts_tumor_site.description: Text term and code that represents the tumor site of the musculoskeletal sarcoma, using the Enneking staging system approved by the Musculoskeletal Tumor Society (MSTS).

disease_response.description: The observed improvement achieved at a certain point in time during a patient's treatment protocol.

UUID.description: A 128-bit identifier. Depending on the mechanism used to generate it, it is either guaranteed to be different from all other UUIDs/GUIDs generated until 3400 AD or extremely likely to be different. Its relatively small size lends itself well to sorting, ordering, and hashing of all sorts, storing in databases, simple allocation, and ease of programming in general.

percent_eosinophil_infiltration.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of infiltration by eosinophils in a tumor sample or specimen.

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure Leukocyte Result Specified Value

wbc.description: The absolute peripheral white blood cell count (in 1000/uL).

termDef.term: Neoplasm American Joint Committee on Cancer Clinical Group Stage

ajcc_clinical_stage.description: Stage group determined from clinical information on the tumor (T), regional node (N) and metastases (M) and by grouping cases with similar prognosis for cancer.

source_center.description: Name of the center that provided the item.

termDef.term: Physician Diagnosed HIV Infection Personal Medical History Yes No Not Applicable Indicator

hiv_positive.description: Text term to signify whether a physician has diagnosed HIV infection in a patient.

percent_tumor_cells.description: Numeric value that represents the percentage of infiltration by granulocytes in a sample.

termDef.term: Person Cigarette Smoking History Pack Year Value

smoking_intensity.description: Numeric computed value to represent lifetime tobacco exposure defined as number of cigarettes smoked per day x number of years smoked divided by 20

termDef.term: Lymphoma B-Symptoms Medical Record Documented Indicator

ann_arbor_b_symptoms.description: Text term to signify whether lymphoma B-symptoms are present as noted in the patient's medical record.

sample_type_id.description: The accompanying sample type id for the sample type.

cigarettes_per_day.description: The average number of cigarettes smoked per day.

weight.description: The weight of the patient measured in kilograms.

days_to_best_overall_response.description: Number of days between the date used for index and the date of the patient's best overall response.

tumor_stage.description: The extent of a cancer in the body. Staging is usually based on the size of the tumor, whether lymph nodes contain cancer, and whether the cancer has spread from the original site to other parts of the body. The accepted values for tumor_stage depend on the tumor site, type, and accepted staging system. These items should accompany the tumor_stage value as associated metadata.

age_at_diagnosis.description: Age at the time of diagnosis expressed in number of days since birth. If the age is greater than 32,872 days (89 years) see 'age_at_diagnosis_gt89'.

percent_gc_content.description: The overall %GC of all bases in all sequences.

specialized_molecular_test.description: Text term used to describe a specific test that is not covered in the list of molecular analysis methods.

termDef.term: HER2 ERBB Positive Finding Cell Percentage Category

her2_erbb2_percent_positive_ihc.description: Classification to represent the number of positive HER2/ERBB2 cells in a specimen or sample.

termDef.term: Enneking Musculoskeletal Tumor Society System Surgical Grade

enneking_msts_grade.description: The text term used to describe the surgical grade of the musculoskeletal sarcoma, using the Enneking staging system approved by the Musculoskeletal Tumor Society (MSTS).

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure HER2/neu in situ Hybridization Outcome Type

her2_erbb2_result_fish.description: the type of outcome for HER2 as determined by an in situ hybridization (ISH) assay.

sample_type.description: Text term to describe the source of a biospecimen used for a laboratory test.

flow_cell_barcode.description: Flow cell barcode. Wrong or missing information may affect analysis results.

tumor_largest_dimension_diameter.description: Numeric value used to describe the maximum diameter or dimension of the primary tumor, measured in centimeters.

termDef.term: Tissue Sample Current Weight Milligram Value

current_weight.description: Numeric value that represents the current weight of the sample, measured  in milligrams.

relationship_age_at_diagnosis.description: The age (in years) when the patient's relative was first diagnosed. If the age is greater than 89 years, see 'relationship_age_at_diagnosis_gt89'.

termDef.term: Submitted Tumor Sample Primary Anatomic Site

biospecimen_anatomic_site.description: Text term that represents the name of the primary disease site of the submitted tumor sample.

data_type.description: Specific content type of the data file.

igl_kappa.description: The patient's serum immunoglobulin light chain kappa value at a certain point in time.

termDef.term: Disease Detection Molecular Analysis Method Type

biomarker_test_method.description: Text descriptor of a molecular analysis method used for an individual.

termDef.term: Molecular Laboratory Procedure Copy Number Count

copy_number.description: Numeric value used to describe the number of times a section of the genome is repeated or copied within an insertion, duplication or deletion variant.

anaplasia_present_type.description: The text term used to describe the morphologic findings indicating the presence of a malignant cellular infiltrate characterized by the presence of large pleomorphic cells, necrosis, and high mitotic activity in a tissue sample.

tissue_or_organ_of_origin.description: Text term that describes the anatomic site of the tumor or disease.

termDef.term: Relative Diagnosis Age Value Greater than 89

relationship_age_at_diagnosis_gt89.description: Indicate whether 'The age (in years) when the patient's relative was first diagnosed' is greater than 89 years.

test_result.description: The text term used to describe the result of the molecular test. If the test result was a numeric value see test_value.

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure Upper Limit of Normal Value

blood_test_normal_range_upper.description: Numeric value used to describe the upper limit of the normal range used to describe a healthy individual at the institution where the test was completed.

termDef.term: New Tumor Event Less Initial Pathologic Diagnosis Date Calculated Day Value

days_to_new_event.description: Time interval from the date of new tumor event including progression, recurrence and new primary malignacies to the date of initial pathologic diagnosis, represented as a calculated number of days.

termDef.term: Colorectal Surgical Margin Circumferential Distance Measurement

circumferential_resection_margin.description: A value in millimeters indicating the measured length between a malignant lesion of the colon or rectum and the nearest radial (or circumferential) border of tissue removed during cancer surgery.

cytoband.description: Alphanumeric value used to describe the cytoband or chromosomal location targeted or included in molecular analysis. If a specific genetic variant is being reported, this property can be used to capture the cytoband where the variant is located. Format: [chromosome][chromosome arm].[band+sub-bands]. Example: 17p13.1.

termDef.term: Molecular Laboratory Procedure Genetic Variant Type

variant_type.description: The text term used to describe the type of genetic variation.

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure Total Serum Protein Outcome Unspecified Value

total_protein.description: The numeric value, in g/dL, for the results of the medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood for total serum proteins, dissolved proteins of blood plasma, consisting mainly of albumins and globulins and include antibodies and blood- clotting proteins.

termDef.term: Molecular Laboratory Procedure DNA Change Text

dna_change.description: Alphanumeric value used to describe the dna change for a specific genetic variant. Example: c.347C>A.

selected_normal_wxs.description: Denotes which WXS normal aliquot to submitter prefers to use for variant calling. Only one normal per experimental strategy per case can be selected.

termDef.term: Tissue Sample Initial Weight Milligram Value

initial_weight.description: Numeric value that represents the initial weight of the sample, measured in milligrams.

sequencing_center.description: Name of the center that provided the sequence files.

year_of_diagnosis.description: Numeric value to represent the year of an individual's initial pathologic diagnosis of cancer.

diabetes_treatment_type.description: Text term used to describe the types of treatment used to manage diabetes.

encoding.description: Version of ASCII encoding of quality values found in the file.

tumor_code_id.description: BCR-defined id code for the tumor sample.

termDef.term: Multiple Myeloma Disease Stage Diagnosis Status

iss_stage.description: The multiple myeloma disease stage at diagnosis.

days_to_adverse_event.description: Number of days between the date used for index and the date the patient had an adverse event.

read_pair_number.description: Denotes whether a submitted FASTQ file contains forward (R1) or reverse (R2) reads for paired-end sequencing.

qc_metric_state.description: State classification given by FASTQC for the metric. Metric specific details about the states are available on their website.

anaplasia_present.description: Yes/no/unknown/not reported indicator used to describe whether anaplasia was present at the time of diagnosis.

termDef.term: Prior Cancer Diagnosis Occurrence Description Text

prior_malignancy.description: The yes/no/unknown indicator used to describe the patient's history of prior cancer diagnosis.

ann_arbor_clinical_stage.description: The text term used to describe the clinical classification of lymphoma, as defined by the Ann Arbor Lymphoma Staging System.

termDef.term: Tumor Mass Organ Origin Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator

tumor_confined_to_organ_of_origin.description: The yes/no/unknown indicator used to describe whether the tumor is confined to the organ where it originated and did not spread to a proximal or distant location within the body.

perineural_invasion_present.description: a yes/no indicator to ask if perineural invasion or infiltration of tumor or cancer is present.

adapter_sequence.description: Base sequence of the sequencing adapter.

test_analyte_type.description: The text term used to describe the type of analyte used for molecular testing.

lost_to_followup.description: A yes/no indicator related to whether a patient was unable to be contacted for follow-up.

progesterone_receptor_result_ihc.description: Text term to represent the overall result of Progresterone Receptor (PR) testing.

blood_test.description: Text term used to describe a specific blood test.

tobacco_smoking_onset_year.description: The year in which the participant began smoking.

termDef.term: Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events Version 4.0 Low Level Term Name

adverse_event.description: Text that represents the Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events low level term name for an adverse event.

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure Albumin Result Specified Value

albumin.description: The value of a lab test used to determine the albumin level in the blood.

growth_rate.description: Rate at which the model grows, measured as hours to time to split.

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure Glucose Electrolytes Outcome Unspecified Value

glucose.description: The numeric value for the amount of glucose found in blood serum.

termDef.term: Enneking Musculoskeletal Tumor Society Staging System Stage

enneking_msts_stage.description: Text term used to describe the stage of the musculoskeletal sarcoma, using the Enneking staging system approved by the Musculoskeletal Tumor Society (MSTS).

termDef.term: Last Communication Contact Less Initial Pathologic Diagnosis Date Calculated Day Value

days_to_last_followup.description: Time interval from the date of last follow up to the date of initial pathologic diagnosis, represented as a calculated number of days.

termDef.term: Tissue Sample Short Dimension Millimeter Measurement

shortest_dimension.description: Numeric value that represents the shortest dimension of the sample, measured in millimeters.

biomarker_name.description: The name of the biomarker being tested for this specimen and set of test results.

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure Creatinine Result Specified Value

creatinine.description: The value, in mg/dL, for the medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood for creatinine, the breakdown product of creatine, a constituent of muscle tissue, that is excreted by the kidney and whose serum level is used to evaluate kidney function.

termDef.term: International Classification of Disease, Tenth Revision Code

icd_10_code.description: Alphanumeric value used to describe the  disease code from the tenth version of the International Classification of Disease (ICD-10).

termDef.term: PRETEXT Staging System Primary Childhood Malignant Liver Tumor Stage

cog_liver_stage.description: The text term used to describe the staging classification of liver tumors, as defined by the Children's Oncology Group (COG). This staging system specifically describes the extent of the primary tumor prior to treatment.

no_matched_normal_wgs.description: There will be no matched normal WGS aliquots for this case that can be used for variant calling purposes. The GDC may elect to use a single tumor calling pipeline to process this data.

termDef.term: Treatment Regimen or Line of Therapy

regimen_or_line_of_therapy.description: The name of a regimen or line of therapy assigned to the patient.

selected_normal_targeted_sequencing.description: Denotes which targeted_sequencing normal aliquot to submitter prefers to use for variant calling. Only one normal per experimental strategy per case can be selected.

days_to_followup.description: Number of days between the date used for index and the date the patient was seen or contacted at follow-up.

termDef.term: Serum Beta-2-Microglobulin Protein Laboratory Procedure Performance Value

beta_2_microglobulin.description: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed for the beta-2-microglobulin protein (119 aa, ~14 kDa) is encoded by the human B2M gene in the clear portion of the blood that remains after the removal of the blood cells and the clotting proteins.

burkitt_lymphoma_clinical_variant.description: Burkitt's lymphoma categorization based on clinical features that differ from other forms of the same disease.

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure Platelet Result Specified Value
Other Cancer Biological Relative History Indicator

relative_with_cancer_history.description: Indicator to signify whether or not an individual's biological relative has been diagnosed with another type of cancer.

termDef.term: Person Self-Report Alcoholic Beverage Exposure Category

alcohol_intensity.description: Category to describe the patient's current level of alcohol use as self-reported by the patient.

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure Lactate Dehydrogenase Result Upper Limit of Normal Value

ldh_normal_range_upper.description: The top value of the range of statistical characteristics that are supposed to represent accepted standard, non-pathological pattern for lactate dehydrogenase (units not specified).

peripancreatic_lymph_nodes_tested.description: The total number of peripancreatic lymph nodes tested for the presence of pancreatic cancer cells.

termDef.term: Biospecimen Collection Date Less Initial Pathologic Diagnosis Date Calculated Day Value

days_to_collection.description: Time interval from the date of biospecimen collection to the date of initial pathologic diagnosis, represented as a calculated number of days.

ribosomal_rna_28s_16s_ratio.description: The 28S/18S ribosomal RNA band ratio used to assess the quality of total RNA.

data_category.description: Broad categorization of the contents of the data file.

loci_abnormal_count.description: Numeric value used to describe the number of loci determined to be abnormal.

loci_count.description: Numeric value used to describe the number of loci tested.

termDef.term: Malignant Neoplasm Neoplasm Nucleus Percentage Cell Value

percent_tumor_nuclei.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of tumor nuclei in a malignant neoplasm sample or specimen.

mismatch_repair_mutation.description: The yes/no/unknown indicator used to describe whether the mutation included in molecular testing was known to have an affect on the mismatch repair process.

file_name.description: The name (or part of a name) of a file (of any type).

progression_or_recurrence_type.description: The text term used to describe the type of progressive or recurrent disease or relapsed disease.

test_value.description: The text term or numeric value used to describe a sepcific result of a molecular test.

termDef.term: Post Bronchodilator Lung Forced Expiratory Volume 1 Test Lab Percentage Value

fev1_ref_post_bronch_percent.description: The percentage comparison to a normal value reference range of the volume of air that a patient can forcibly exhale from the lungs in one second post-bronchodilator.

file_size.description: The size of the data file (object) in bytes.

termDef.term: Biospecimen Analyte or Aliquot Extracted Concentration Milligram per Milliliter Value

concentration.description: Numeric value that represents the concentration of an analyte or aliquot extracted from the sample or sample portion, measured in milligrams per milliliter.

termDef.term: New Neoplasm Event Occurrence Anatomic Site

new_event_anatomic_site.description: Text term to specify the anatomic location of the return of tumor after treatment.

ishak_fibrosis_score.description: The text term used to describe the classification of the histopathologic degree of liver damage.

portion_number.description: Numeric value that represents the sequential number assigned to a portion of the sample.

termDef.term: Malignant Neoplasm Normal Cell Percentage Value

percent_normal_cells.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of normal cell content in a malignant tumor sample or specimen.

termDef.term: Tissue Sample Longest Dimension Millimeter Measurement

longest_dimension.description: Numeric value that represents the longest dimension of the sample, measured in millimeters.

aliquot_quantity.description: The quantity in micrograms (ug) of the aliquot(s) derived from the analyte(s) shipped for sequencing and characterization.

object_id.description: The GUID of the object in the index service.

termDef.term: Tumor To Normal Control Tissue DNA Distance Category

distance_normal_to_tumor.description: Text term to signify the distance between the tumor tissue and the normal control tissue that was procured for matching normal DNA.

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure Serum Immunologic IgG Result Unspecified Value

igg.description: The numeric value, in mg/dL, for the amount of immunoglobulin type G (IgG) found in blood serum.

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure Serum Immunologic IgA Result Unspecified Value

iga.description: The numeric value, in mg/dL, for the amount of immunoglobulin type A (IgA) found in blood serum.

menopause_status.description: Text term used to describe the patient's menopause status.

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure Serum Immunologic IgM Result Unspecified Value

igm.description: The numeric value, in mg/dL, for the amount of immunoglobulin type M (IgM) found in blood serum.

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure Carcinoembryonic Antigen Outcome Value

cea_level.description: The value for carcinoembryonic antigen, a substance that is sometimes found in an increased amount in the blood of people with certain cancers.

case_submitter_id.description: The submitter_id of the case (study subject) of a file (of any type). Used for associating a data_file with a particular case.

experimental_strategy.description: The sequencing strategy used to generate the data file.

cell_count.description: Numeric value used to describe the number of cells used for molecular testing.

method_of_sample_procurement.description: The method used to procure the sample used to extract analyte(s).

termDef.term: Malignant Neoplasm Stromal Cell Percentage Value

percent_stromal_cells.description: Numeric value to represent the percentage of reactive cells that are present in a malignant tumor sample or specimen but are not malignant such as fibroblasts, vascular structures, etc.

tissue_type.description: Text term that represents a description of the kind of tissue collected with respect to disease status or proximity to tumor tissue.

biospecimen_laterality.description: For tumors in paired organs, designates the side on which the specimen was obtained.

hpv_status.description: The findings of the oncogenic HPV.

termDef.term: American Joint Committee on Cancer Publication Version Type

ajcc_staging_system_edition.description: The text term used to describe the version or edition of the American Joint Committee on Cancer Staging Handbooks, a publication by the group formed for the purpose of developing a system of staging for cancer that is acceptable to the American medical profession and is compatible with other accepted classifications.

termDef.term: Molecular Laboratory Procedure Transcript Location Text

transcript.description: Alphanumeric value used to describe the transcript of a specific genetic variant.

new_event_type.description: Text term to identify a new tumor event.

medulloblastoma_molecular_classification.description: The text term used to describe the classification of medulloblastoma tumors based on molecular features.

passage_count.description: Number of passages (splits) between the original tissue and this model.

termDef.term: SIOP/COG/NWTSG Staging System Wilms Tumor Stage

cog_renal_stage.description: The text term used to describe the staging classification of renal tumors, as defined by the Children's Oncology Group (COG).

termDef.term: Viral Hepatitis Laboratory Procedure Serology Test Method Type

viral_hepatitis_serologies.description: Text term that describes the kind of serological laboratory test used to determine the patient's hepatitus status.

synchronous_malignancy.description: A yes/no/unknown indicator used to describe whether the patient had an additional malignant diagnosis at the same time the tumor used for sequencing was diagnosed. If both tumors were sequenced, both tumors would have synchronous malignancies.

workflow_type.description: Generic name for the workflow used to analyze a data set.

termDef.term: International Classification of Diseases for Oncology, Third Edition ICD-O-3 Site Code

site_of_resection_or_biopsy.description: The third edition of the International Classification of Diseases for Oncology, published in 2000, used principally in tumor and cancer registries for coding the site (topography) and the histology (morphology) of neoplasms. The description of an anatomical region or of a body part. Named locations of, or within, the body. A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

termDef.term: Molecular Laboratory Procedure Outcome Consequence Type

molecular_consequence.description: The text term used to describe the molecular consequence of genetic variation.

days_to_comorbidity.description: Number of days between the date used for index and the date the patient was diagnosed with a comorbidity.

termDef.term: Laboratory Procedure Blood Urea Nitrogen Result Unspecified Value

bun.description: The laboratory value (units of measure unspecified) for a renal lab test for blood urea nitrogen.

catalog_reference.description: HCMI catalog reference number for cancer model.

last_dt.description: Last contact date (DDmonYYYY). From RERF 'mort_fup' table.

fup.description: Indicates vital status at last follow-up ("1" or "3" is alive; "2" indicates dead). From RERF 'mort_fup' table.

aliquot.yaml.description: A portion taken from a sample used for analysis, including analytes extracted from a sample.

storage_temperature.description: The temperature, in centigrade, at which the aliquot was preserved and/or stored.

hours_to_analyte.description: The amount of time, in hours, that it took between the sample being fractionated and the analyte being extracted.

analyte_a260_a280_ratio.description: The ratio of absorbance at 260 and 280 nm for nucleic acid analytes.

analyte_concentration.description: Concentration of the analyte in the aliquot.

preservation_method.description: The method used to preserve the aliquot.

analyte_type.description: Any aspect of an aliquot used in an analysis or assay to characterize the sample. These aspects range from molecules, such as DNA and RNA, that can be extracted from the aliquot to general descriptions of the aliquot's components, such as cell count and morphology.

hours_to_preservation.description: The amount of time, in hours, that it took between the sample being fractionated and the aliquot being frozen or otherwise preserved.

aliquot_container.description: The device in which the final aliquot is held. Slides or vials.

days_to_aliquot.description: The amount of time, in days, between the date used for index and the time the aliquot was separated from the whole sample.

analyte_isolation_method.description: The name or general description of the method used to isolate the analyte.

aliquot.yaml.title: Aliquot

variant_call_file.yaml.description: Data file containing variants called from sequencing reads.

variant_calling_workflow.description: Indicate the variant calling workflow or pipeline used to generate the variant calls.

variant_call_file.yaml.title: Variant Call File (VCF)

subject.yaml.description: The collection of all data related to a specific subject in the context of a specific project.

city.description: The city in which a person was exposed to radiation (1- Hiroshima, 2- Nagasaki). From RERF 'id' table.

ahs.description: Indication of whether a person was in the Adult Health Study (AHS) cohort (0- not AHS, 1- AHS (original), 2- AHS (addition)). From RERF 'lss_master' table.

index_date.description: The reference or anchor date used during date obfuscation, where a single date is obscurred by creating one or more date ranges in relation to this date.

sex.description: The sex of a person (1- Male, 2- Female). From RERF 'id' table.

sysid.description: A unique identifier for an individual person in a study. From RERF 'id' table.

entry_dt.description: Entry date (DDmonYYYY, e.g., 21dec1912). From RERF 'lss_master' table.

subject.yaml.title: Subject

sample.yaml.description: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Samples can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

enum: Mononuclear Cells from Bone Marrow Normal

sample.yaml.title: Sample

diagnostic_test.yaml.description: The result of a standard clinical test that is performed for diagnostic or health monitoring purposes, including biopsies and other small surgical procedures, biomarker assays, and imaging tests.

test_units_other.description: The units corresponding to a 'test_value' for an 'analyte_name' if 'Other (specify)' was chosen for 'test_units

analyte_name.description: The name of analyte or biomarker tested in the case that the test is a quantitative assay.

test_value.description: The numerical value representing the diagnostic test measurement of the 'analyte_name'; also indicate the 'test_units'.

equipment_model.description: The equipment name and model number used for the test; please also indicate the manufacturer name in 'equipment_manufacturer'.

enum: Mononuclear Cells from Bone Marrow Normal
test_sample_composition.description: Indicate the composition or type of biological sample used for the test (e.g., blood, urine, solid tissue, saliva, etc.)

test_result.description: The categorical result of the laboratory test.

test_anatomic_site.description: Indicate the anatomic site of the biopsy, image or other diagnostic test

assay_kit_vendor.description: The name of the vendor or manufacturer of the kit used for the test; please also indicate the kit name and version in 'assay_kit_name' and 'assay_kit_version'.

enum: Normalized Ion Intensity by Endogenous Arginine and Autoscaled
test_units.description: The units corresponding to a test_value for a test_analyte_type

assay_kit_version.description: The version of the kit used for the test; please also indicate the kit name and vendor in 'assay_kit_name' and 'assay_kit_vendor'.

test_type.description: The general type or category of the laboratory test

equipment_manufacturer.description: The name of the manufacturer of the equipment used for the test; please also indicate the model number in 'equipment_model'.

assay_kit_name.description: The name of the kit used for the test or assay; please also indicate the kit vendor and version in 'assay_kit_vendor' and 'assay_kit_version'.

days_to_test.description: Number of days between the date used for index and the date the patient was diagnosed with a comorbidity.

diagnostic_test.yaml.title: Diagnostic Test

death.yaml.description: Data related to a person's death.

death_cause.description: The cause of death. From RERF 'icd_grp_fk' table.

death_icd_grp.description: A grouping for the cause of death. From RERF 'death_icd' table.

death_icd_rev.description: The revision number of the ICD code used. From RERF 'death_icd' table.

death_icd.description: The ICD code for the cause of death. From RERF 'death_icd' table.

death_icd_sgrp.description: A grouping for the cause of death. From RERF 'death_icd' table.

death.yaml.title: Death

study.yaml.description: A coordinated set of actions and observations designed to generate data, with the ultimate goal of discovery or hypothesis testing.

data_description.description: Brief description of the data being provided for this study. Free text

study_design.description: Summary of the goals the study is designed to discover. General description of the study's place in relation to a clinical application.

study_description.description: A brief description of the study being performed. Free text

submitter_id.description: A project-specific identifier for a node. This property is the calling card/nickname/alias for a unit of submission. It can be used in place of the UUID for identifying or recalling a node.

associated_study.description: The submitter_id for any study with which this study is associated, paired, or matched.

study_setup.description: A high level description of the setup used to achieve the study objectives.

study_objective.description: The general objective of the study. What the study hopes to discover or determine through testing.

study.yaml.title: Study

seqno.description: Identifies the order of cancer diagnosis dates. From RERF 'summ_dx_fix' table.

imaging_file.yaml.description: Data file containing diagnostic image from clinical imaging exam.

days_to_image.description: Days from the case index date to the date the image was acquired.

imaging_type.description: The type of imaging exam performed.

body_part_examined.description: What part of the body was studied.

modality.description: What mode the imaging instrument was in during image acquisition.

imaging_instrument.description: The instrument model used to acquire the image.

scan_id.description: The identification number for a stack of images generated during a single scan.

magnification.description: Magnification used to capture the image.

study_description.description: Type of the study and a studied body part.

imaging_file.yaml.title: Imaging File

core_metadata_collection.yaml.description: Structured description of a collection of several datasets

description.description: An account of the resource. Description may include but is not limited to- an abstract, a table of contents, a graphical representation, or a free-text account of the resource.

data_type.description: The nature or genre of the resource. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as the DCMI Type Vocabulary [DCMITYPE]. To describe the file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource, use the Format element.

creator.description: An entity primarily responsible for making the resource. Examples of a Creator include a person, an organization, or a service. Typically, the name of a Creator should be used to indicate the entity.

contributor.description: An entity responsible for making contributions to the resource. Examples of a Contributor include a person, an organization, or a service. Typically, the name of a Contributor should be used to indicate the entity.

relation.description: A related resource. Recommended best practice is to identify the related resource by means of a string conforming to a formal identification system.

coverage.description: The spatial or temporal topic of the resource, the spatial applicability of the resource, or the jurisdiction under which the resource is relevant. Spatial topic and spatial applicability may be a named place or a location specified by its geographic coordinates. Temporal topic may be a named period, date, or date range. A jurisdiction may be a named administrative entity or a geographic place to which the resource applies. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as the Thesaurus of Geographic Names [TGN] (http-//www.getty.edu/research/tools/vocabulary/tgn/index.html). Where appropriate, named places or time periods can be used in preference to numeric identifiers such as sets of coordinates or date ranges.

subject.description: The topic of the resource. Typically, the subject will be represented using keywords, key phrases, or classification codes. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

publisher.description: An entity responsible for making the resource available. Examples of a Publisher include a person, an organization, or a service. Typically, the name of a Publisher should be used to indicate the entity.

language.description: A language of the resource. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as RFC 4646 (http-//www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4646.txt).

rights.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource. Typically, rights information includes a statement about various property rights associated with the resource, including intellectual property rights.

format.description: The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource. Examples of dimensions include size and duration. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as the list of Internet Media Types [MIME] (http-//www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/).

source.description: A related resource from which the described resource is derived. The described resource may be derived from the related resource in whole or in part. Recommended best practice is to identify the related resource by means of a string conforming to a formal identification system.

title.description: A name given to the resource. Typically, a Title will be a name by which the resource is formally known.

core_metadata_collection.yaml.title: Core Metadata Collection

base_mortality.yaml.description: Cohort data related to study entry and death from cancer.

col_dose.description: Radiation dose received by colon. From RERF 'base_mortality' table.

age_in.description: Age at entry date (entry_dt). From RERF 'base_mortality' table.

nic.description: Not in City. From RERF 'base_mortality' table.

age_out.description: Age at last follow-up, age at death, or age at end of study. From RERF 'base_mortality' table.

cancerdeath.description: Indicator for a death of interest. From RERF 'base_mortality' table.

base_mortality.yaml.title: Base Mortality

program.yaml.description: A broad framework of goals to be achieved. (NCIt C52647)

dbgap_accession_number.description: The dbgap accession number provided for the program.

program.yaml.title: Program

clinical_supplement.yaml.description: Data file containing clinical metadata information.

data_category.description: A broad category for the type of data contained in the supplemental file.

data_type.description: The specific type of data contained in the supplemental file.

clinical_supplement.yaml.title: Clinical Supplement

pathology_slide.yaml.description: Data file containing a pathology slide.

body_part_examined.description: What part of the body was studied.

modality.description: What mode the imaging instrument was in during image acquisition.

imaging_instrument.description: The instrument model used to acquire the image.

scan_id.description: The identification number for a stack of images generated during a single scan.

days_to_image.description: Days from the case index date to the date the image was acquired.

magnification.description: Magnification used to capture the image.

study_description.description: Type of the study and a studied body part.

pathology_slide.yaml.title: Pathology Slide

source.description: Source (KO or MF). From RERF 'births' table.

ind.description: Indicates eligibility for Lifespan Study. From RERF 'births' table.

birth_dt.description: Birth date (DDmonYYYY, e.g., 21dec1912). From RERF 'births' table.

project.yaml.description: Any specifically defined piece of work that is undertaken or attempted to meet a single requirement. (NCIt C47885)

date_collected.description: The date or date range in which the project data was collected.

complete.description: Description of whether the project submission is complete or still in progress.

intended_release_date.description: Tracks a Project's intended release date.

support_id.description: The ID of the source providing support/grant resources.

releasable.description: A project can only be released by the user when `releasable` is true.

released.description:
To release a project is to tell the GDC to include all submitted
entities in the next GDC index.

availability_type.description: Is the project open or restricted?

dbgap_accession_number.description: The dbgap accession number provided for the project.

name.description: Display name/brief description for the project.

programs.description: The program to which the project belongs.

investigator_affiliation.description: The investigator's affiliation with respect to a research institution.

availability_mechanism.description: Mechanism by which the project will be made avilable.

support_source.description: The name of source providing support/grant resources.

state.description:
The possible states a project can be in. All but 'open' are
equivalent to some type of locked state.

investigator_name.description: Name of the principal investigator for the project.

project.yaml.title: Project

variant_calling_workflow.yaml.description: A description of the specific bioinformatics workflow or pipeline used for variant calling.
variant_calling_workflow.yaml.title: Variant Calling Workflow

read_group.yaml.description: Sequencing reads from one lane of an NGS experiment.

read_length_lower.description: The lower limit for the length of reads used in the sequencing experiment.

customization.description: A description of any special setup or customization not documented elsewhere.

cycles.description: The number of cycles used in the assay (e.g., 50,000x per sample).

coverage.description: Sequencing coverage used in the assay (e.g., 75 PE).

read_length_upper.description: The upper limit for the length of reads used in the sequencing experiment.

read_group_name.description: The name given to this read group. Should match what is provided in the headers of associated files.

enum: Ion S5 XL System, Ion 530 Chip

universal_molecular_identifier.description: Short sequences or barcodes added to each read for next generation sequencing protocols used to detect and quantify unique transcripts.

read_group.yaml.title: Read Group
